title: [BONUS] Introducing: Play Me A Recipe
description:
Play Me a Recipe is hosted by a rotating cast, including Food52 co-founder Amanda Hesser, Genius hunter Kristen Miglore, editorial lead Brinda Ayer, and senior editor Arati Menon. 

To kick the show off, we're passing the spatula to eight special guest-hosts so they can share the recipes that have been special to them and their families each holiday season.


Subscribe here, so you don’t miss out; see (hear?) you in the kitchen.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Carla hall, Kristen Miglore, Samantha Seneviratne, Maurizio Leo, Arati Menon, Amanda Hesser, Hetty McKinnon, Brinda Ayer, Sarah Kieffer, Susan Spungen, Nik Sharma, Francis Lam)

itunes:summary: Head into the kitchen with your favorite Food52 cooks and their special guests. They’ll chop, stir, and sauté their way through a recipe—and you’ll be right there with them, every step of the way.
